title: Transport Services
description: Reliable and accessible transport services for people with disabilities. Our professional drivers and specially equipped vehicles ensure safe, comfortable, and on-time transportation to appointments, activities, and community events.
content:
Accessible Transport Solutions

Our specialized transport services provide reliable, safe, and comfortable transportation for people with disabilities, mobility challenges, or those who require assistance when traveling. We help you maintain your independence by ensuring you can attend appointments, social activities, educational programs, and community events with ease.

Our Transport Services Include:

  • Medical Appointments: Reliable transportation to and from medical, therapy, and healthcare appointments
  • Community Access: Transport to social activities, recreational events, and community participation
  • Educational Transport: Regular transportation to educational facilities and training programs
  • Shopping Assistance: Transport and support for shopping trips
  • Social Outings: Transportation for social gatherings, family visits, and special events
  • Work Transportation: Regular transport to and from employment locations

Our Transport Fleet

Our transport service features:

  • Wheelchair Accessible Vehicles: Specially modified vehicles with ramps or lifts
  • Safety Equipment: Proper restraints and securing systems for wheelchairs and mobility aids
  • Comfortable Seating: Well-maintained, comfortable vehicles for all journey lengths
  • Climate Control: Air-conditioned vehicles for comfort in all weather conditions
  • Trained Drivers: Experienced in assisting passengers with various needs

Comprehensive Support

Our transport service is more than just getting from point A to point B. We provide:

  • Door-to-Door Service: Assistance from your home to your destination
  • Accompaniment: Support workers can accompany you throughout your journey
  • Loading Assistance: Help with mobility equipment, shopping bags, and personal items
  • Flexible Scheduling: One-time trips, regular bookings, or recurring schedules

NDIS Funded Transport

Our transport services can be accessed through NDIS funding under Core Supports - Transport. We can help you understand how to use your transport funding within your NDIS plan to access the community and attend appointments.

Professional Transport Team

Our drivers and transport support workers are:

  • Licensed and experienced
  • Trained in disability awareness and support
  • Skilled in safely securing wheelchairs and mobility aids
  • Background-checked and screened
  • Punctual and reliable
  • Friendly and respectful

Booking Your Transport

We offer a simple booking system with options to schedule:

  • Regular recurring trips
  • Advance bookings for upcoming appointments
  • Short-notice transport when possible

Contact Us About Transport Services

Our team is ready to discuss how our transport services can support your mobility needs. Contact us today to learn more about our approach and how we can help you maintain your independence and community connections.
